text: Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut?
He just needed a little space.
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: What, no laugh? Was it too out of this world for you?
dialogs.ohnoReaction: A joke about space and you're upset? Lighten up!

text: I always wanted to be an astronaut,
But I was afraid of heights.
dialogs.hahaReaction: Oh, you find my fears funny? That's cold.
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: Silent? My dreams are floating away here!

text: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
dialogs.hahaReaction: Bears and jokes, a perfect match!
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: Not even a chuckle? That's unbearable!
dialogs.ohnoReaction: Sad? It's a joke, not a wildlife documentary!

text: Just kidding. But I always wanted a pet.
dialogs.hahaReaction: Laughing at my misfortune? That's harsh!
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: Ignoring my story? That's just rude.
dialogs.ohnoReaction: You understand, it's nice to connect.

text: Why don't skeletons fight each other?
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: No reaction? What, did I tickle your funny bone too hard?
dialogs.ohnoReaction: Scared of a skeleton joke? It's humor, not horror!

text: I used to get into a lot of fights as a kid.
I guess I had a lot of anger.
dialogs.hahaReaction: Finding joy in my troubled past? You're twisted!
dialogs.ohnoReaction: Pity? I don't need your pity!

text: I wrote a song about a tortilla.
Well, itâ€™s more of a wrap.
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: Speechless? It's a joke, not a riddle!
dialogs.ohnoReaction: It's a joke, not a tragedy! Cheer up!

text: But I never learned to play an instrument.
dialogs.hahaReaction: Mocking my unfulfilled dreams? You're cruel!
dialogs.dotdotdotReaction: Too shocked to speak? It's just a sad tune.
